turns.text: Save the Children provided assistance in many ways. If a child is in an area of war and can't go to school, Save the Children will help relocate the child to safer school. If a child is in a danger zone with no food, Save the Children establishes emergency malnutrition units in the hardest hit areas. It is a very large effort for lots of people.

turns.text: A donation is the easiest way to make a large impact. Our independently audited financial statements consistently show that nearly 9 out of every 10 dollars we spend goes to programs and services for children and families in need. We keep administrative costs low so that more funding goes to children's programs.
